name: Facebook Background Generator (Galaxy)
description: The galaxy background generator for my Black Facebook theme. Choose from six different wallpapers, and override the theme's plain black background. The preview shows the login page, but the background will appear on all FB pages. pfeiffer stylez is also on Facebook.
additional_info: This is not a stand-alone style, just the background. You'll also need the Black Facebook theme to get what you see in the preview images.

discussions.name: Could become a theme of it's own!
